person.persName: Matthew Spain Verdery (Chatham County, Georgia, student, druggist, justice of the peace, and commissioner of deeds)

body.p: Chatham County, Georgia, student, druggist, justice of the peace, and commissioner of deeds. Georgia native. Son of Martha Verdery. Married to Clara Jane Barie Verdery in Chatham County, Georgia, on September 22, 1857. Father of Morris G. Verdery. Student in Richmond County in 1850. Druggist in Chatham County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Chatham County in 1861. Commissioner of deeds for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in Georgia in 1861.
